author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Do people not realize that almost everyone has cameras these days? Because it’s unclear if one Amazon driver in California realized that before going viral for pooping and peeing at two different houses on mothers day.


Well Damn… Amazon driver poops, pees in front of at least two L.A. homes on Mother's Day. pic.twitter.com/1YKVu3EZg0
— SHO’NUFF (@IAMSHO_NUFF) May 12, 2025

That's one way to get clicks.
title: Amazon driver busted using a customer’s home as a toilet… more than ONCE in the same day

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Despite how someone may feel deep down inside, DNA will always be DNA. So, even though a male runner can claim to feel some type of way, that will never be justification for him to steal titles away from women athletes who have dedicated much of their lives to the sport.

In yet another win for the patriarchy that the left pretends to despise, a high school runner has stolen first place in the Women’s 200m in Pennsylvania.

🚨This past weekend at a HS track meet in PA, MALE, Sean “Luce” Allen, STOLE 1st place in the Women’s 200m.

Just look at the video. Notice the height, the size, the significantly larger build compared to the girls.

HOW would anyone deem this as fair??

Huge Title IX violation… pic.twitter.c
title: Trans runner blows away all the female competition. See if you figure out which one he/she is

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
According to Jasmine Crockett, the Democrats are learning towards the “safest white boy” as their next candidate because “every time [they] have voted for a women, [they] have lost.”

Jasmine Crockett says Democrat donors are pushing for a safe "white boy" as the next candidate:

"There’s a lot of people that are like, you know what? Like, let’s go find the safest white boy we can find. I mean, I’m just saying."pic.twitter.com/eiSP9xehtH
— Thomas Sowell Quotes (@ThomasSowell) May 11, 2025


There are so many issues
title: Jasmine Crockett's latest racist rant involves who her party thinks is the "safest white boy"

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
It turns out that “when you have an immigration system that seems almost designed to permit abuse,” this does not actually “champion growth” or “justice,” at least according to UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer.

Starmer has announced mass immigration reform efforts, as a result of the country becoming an “island of strangers."

NEW: UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer calls for the UK to take back its borders, says the UK is becoming an “island of strangers” and immigrants should learn how to speak English.

Wow.

“Without [strict rules], we risk becoming an island of strangers, not a nation that walks… pic.twitter.com/qrcyc7iymI
— Collin Rugg (@CollinRugg)
title: UK Prime Minister makes shocking realization about mass migration... it might be a bad thing afterall

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Secretary of the Treasury Scott Bessent met with officials from China to discuss a trade deal, and it’s looking good. Today’s show breaks it down.

According to the Financial Times:

The US and China have agreed to lower tariffs for the next 90 days in a major de-escalation of the trade war between the world’s two largest economies.

“The 90-day [window] will really tell us if this is a win or not,” Gerald A said. “It does not seem like we caved right now, but we are still not 100% sure.”
title: Watch: What the Media isn't Telling You About Trump's China Trade Deal

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
It’s unclear if the City of Nashville intends to launch a fund to support legal residents or citizens with childcare, transportation, housing, and food, but it is clear they are doing just that for those who have broken federal immigration laws.

The city has launched the “Belonging Fund,” which, according to the press release, is “a new effort to support immigrants in Nashville during moments of crisis. "

CLOSED BORDER: Nashville’s Democrat mayor claims that cooperation between the Tennessee Highway Patrol and ICE is inflicting “deep community harms,” and in response, he’s created a tax
title: Nashville Mayor sells out taxpayers, creates new fund to help illegals with housing and more

author: Brodigan
description:
Will President Donald Trump suspend habeas corpus? Can he? What even is habeas corpus? We keep hearing that the United States is being invaded and that’s really the first thing we need to answer. Mayor Ras J. Baraka was arrested after forcing his way into an ICE facility. Let’s see how the Leftists want to spin this. Trump posted on Truth Social about prescription drugs. Liberation Day saw China hit with tariffs that eventually rose to 145%. Secretary of the Treasury Scott Bessent met with Chinese officials in Switzerland to come to some kind of trade deal and it’s looking good. Are there more wins coming for the Trump administration?

SUSPENDING
title: Trump's China Trade Deal Explained: Winners, Losers, & What the Media isn't Telling You (Sources)

author: Kate Cornell
description:
I saw this posted on X and so now, of course, I’m bringing you a far better article. Dazed recently posted an article called 10 books that are dating red flags or Liking Any of these 10 Books is an Immediate Red Flag. That’s right, Dazed. I looked at the address bar and found your original title. And, just because I have a book doesn’t mean I liked it. Or, let’s face it, that I’ve even had a chance to read it yet. My interests are varied, and my time is limited.

Dazed’s list:

  1. A Clockwork Orange (I own it, but have not read it)
  2. The Catcher in the Rye (Read it in high school; overrated)
  3. The Alchemist (don
title: 10 Books that are Dating Green Flags

author: Brodigan
description:
You knew as soon as they announced the first American Pope, things were going to get silly. Pope Leo is the first Pontiff to have a social media history. And after scouring his old tweets -- or reading what someone else scoured because that's a thing people too -- illustrates why I wouldn't vote for the Pope for political office in America, it turns out the Pope's brother is pretty based. Yes, we're scouring his social media history too.

Well, not "we." Left-wing tabloid The Daily Beast.

Louis Prevost is a Florida Man, a Trump supporter, and judging from an old Facebook post... thinks Nancy Pelosi is a drunk c*nt. Also, her husban
title: Turns out Pope Leo's brother is pretty BASED, calls for Dems to be arrested, labels Dem leader a "drunk c***"
